name: Come Back Home (Aeclain)
description:
COME BACK HOME:

Come Back Home is the sequel to You, Me, and the All-engulfing Sea (can be played without previous knowledge). It builds on the previous storyline from the perspective of a different individual, and presents a similar style of gameplay, with puzzles and exploration to escape a strange place. In this game, the player awakens in a unknown, yet oddly familiar underwater building, as a teenage boy by the name of Adrian. Through his attempt to escape and gather information,  the story of his past, as well as the fate of his future, becomes increasingly clear.

CONTROLS:

  • keyboard
  • action z
  • menu x
  • cancel x
